title: Thoughts on this Ezreal build

replies.body: I think Tri force is better than ice born and cleaver with the new attack speed buffs to ezreal and provides better stats, you don't really need bloodthirster so swap that out for mercurial scimitar if needed and make sure you get your last whisper 3rd or 4th item, fervor is also the best keystone for this build
Remove BT imo. Giant Slayer is probably going to be more worth your while more often than BC as well.. IMO
